name: Morning Rituals (Dania Hamad)
description:
Morning Rituals

A game about a girl choosing her morning rituals, made during Godot Wild Jam #50.

This game is not fully completed (consider it a demo).

When the rating is done will update and polish the game.

Endings

A total of 19 endings:

  • 4 Major Endings (1 Healthy and 3 unhealthy endings)
  • 8 Functional Endings
  • 4 Non-Functional Endings 
  • 3 Ritual Endings (Currently not accessible)
